name: B2in
description:
An endless game where you have to be between lines to progress! It may need some reactions but mostly managing your position to be able to get in B2in!

This game was made for Extra Credits Game Jam #4 in 100 hours!

How to play:

Left Click - Speeds up the player.

Right Click - Extends the player's arms to connect the lines when the orbs are in range to progress further. Can be also used to pick up coins to buy different colors.

If there are any performance issues or any other issues, try out the PC versions!
